title: TO:GETHER
content:
on Sat 12th September 2015 
TO:GETHER 
 
Saturday September 12th 
 
@ 02 Academy Leeds 
 
11pm – 5am Strictly 
 
Over 21’s Policy 
 
HABIT – HECTIK – GLASSHOUSE – FILTH - UBER 
 
Tickets On Sale Tuesday June 30th From 9am 
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
 
After months of talks and negotiations we can proudly confirm 5 infamous Leeds brands have come TO:GETHER for one huge night symbolizing the mark they left on the Leeds clubbing scene. 
 
Each brand was infamous in their own right and entertained 1000s of clubbers on a regular basis before moving on to pastures new. 
 
Its time to bring them all TO:GETHER and give people the party they deserve. 
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
 
➨ MAIN STAGE 
 
HABIT – HECTIK – GLASSHOUSE 
 
JULIE MCKNIGHT – LIVE PERFORMING 
 
“DIAMOND LIFE” 
 
“YELLOW BRICK ROAD” (HOME) 
 
“FINALLY” 
 
“HOW SOON IS NOW”

DANIEL JOHN

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
 
OFFICIAL AFTERPARTY – VENUE TBC

DANIEL JOHN 
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
 
➨ TICKETS 
 
£20 Standard 
 
£30 VIP 
 
VIP Tickets get you straight to the front of the line and access to the VIP balcony, which allows you the best views of the main stage with your own bar and toilets. It’s a VIP that is actually a VIP! 

 Music Genres:  House 

 Entry Prices  

Minimum age: 21 

Entry price (public): £20
